item.description:
Who's Next, a local tribute to The Who has taken the idea of paying tribute to an entirely different level then most. The whole idea is to give the crowd the complete experience of being at a Who show.

Come enjoy a FREE show at the Light House Bar with in Twin River Casino. TWO drink minimum.

Closer your arrival to 7:30, the better chance of getting good seat.

Twin River features 300,000 square feet of gaming space, over 4,700 slot machines, and virtual blackjack and roulette tables, you're bound to find the kind of gaming excitement you're looking for.

They also offer over 16 other dining outlets throughout the property, so you have many options to chose from!
item.name: Who's Next @ Lighthouse Bar
